content.prompt: Which of the following developments best explains a cause of the historical process described in the excerpt?

choices.label: Nativists rejected the use of immigrant workers for transportation infrastructure construction.
Plantation owners sought improved transportation to expand the sharecropping system.
Difficult working conditions prompted transportation workers to call for the creation of labor unions.
Government subsidies facilitated the construction of transportation and communication networks.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
